text: (eyata ovunge piya) “ma ohuva oba samaga yavannema næta. ehet oba siyallanvama (kisima vipatak) vata kara gatahot misa, niyata vasayenma ohuva ma veta gena ennehu yayi allah mata oba (siyallanma) ma hata divra nodunnahot misa” yayi pævasuveya. ovun (ese) ohuta divra dun vahama, eyata ohu “api kara gat mema givisumata allahma araksakayeku vasayen sitinneya” yayi (pævasimen anaturuva, bunyaminva kændavagena yamata) anumætiya laba dunneya
